Class.Name: SearchIndex
Class.Description: Field map with a match row names to an array or rowname, ususally used in data retrieval.

Function.Name: add_text
Function.Description: Adds a text to the index

Function.Name: add_word
Function.Description: Adds a word text and its information to the index

Function.Name: find_docs
Function.Description: Finds the files containing a word

Function.Name: trie
Function.Description: Returns the trie data structure tracking words in documents

Function.Name: for_each
Function.Description: Process each item in the trie

Function.Name: dump
Function.Description: dumps the index to a file
